humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the largest focus of invasive tumor measures 3.5 cm in greatest dimension, which is located in the 12 o'clock portion of the breast. According to the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions 'the largest focus of invasive tumor measures 3.5 cm in greatest dimension and is located in the 12 o'clock portion of the breast'. This indicates that the tumor is larger than 3 cm but not larger than 5 cm, which corresponds to T2 stage.
